client.model

Class Hex

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.model.interfaces.IHex
      • client.model.Hex

  • public class Hex
extends IHex
    The hex class represents a hex on the map. It has a location, resource type, and an int.
    Author:
    Epper Marshall
